tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legislative_history (
  policy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_name STRING,
  policy_type STRING,
  enactment_date DATE,
  approval_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE legislators ( 
        id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
        name VARCHAR(255), 
        party VARCHAR(50), 
        state VARCHAR(50), 
        position VARCHAR(100) 
    );

CREATE TABLE policies ( 
        id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
        policy_name VARCHAR(255), 
        description TEXT, 
        enacted_date DATE, 
        expiration_date DATE 
    );

CREATE TABLE PolicyMakers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    title VARCHAR(50),
    party VARCHAR(50),
    district VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Legislation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    history JSONB,
    date_passed DATE
);

CREATE TABLE PolicyDecisions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    decision_date DATE,
    decision_maker_id INT,
    legislation_id INT,
    decision VARCHAR(100)
);
